1.0.name: wordpress/emma-email-signup
1.0.description: Emma Signup is a plugin to add an email signup form for your Emma account in your Wordpress site. Note, you must be an existing Emma customer to use this plugin. Haven’t signed up yet? Do so at myemma.com. Want an example of this plugin in action? Browse to Studio66 Website Design and look on the right side of the page. Please send any comments and feedback to peter@studio66design.com
